DoubleVect & Champ_implementation_P0::valeur_a_elem ( const DoubleVect &  position,
DoubleVect &  result,
int  poly 
) const [virtual]

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Reimplemented in Champ_Fonc_P0_base, and Champ_Inc_P0_base.

Definition at line 34 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), le_champ(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), DoubleVect::size(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  int            nb_components = ch_base.nb_comp();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();

  assert(result.size() == nb_components);
  assert(poly>=0);
  assert(poly<values.dimension_tot(0));
  assert(values.nb_dim() == 2);
  assert(values.dimension(1) == nb_components);

  for (int i=0; i<nb_components; i++)
    result(i) = values(poly,i);

  return result;
}

Definition at line 52 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), Field_base::nb_comp(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();

  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(poly>=0);
  assert(poly<values.dimension_tot(0));

  double result = 0;

  assert(values.line_size() == ch_base.nb_comp());
  result = values(poly,ncomp);

  return result;
}

const IntVect &  polys,

< Some post-processed fields can have nb_dim() == 1

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Reimplemented in Champ_Fonc_P0_base, and Champ_Inc_P0_base.

Definition at line 70 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), DoubleTab::resize(), IntVect::size(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  int            nb_components = ch_base.nb_comp();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
  int nb_polys = polys.size();

  if (nb_polys==0)
    return result;

// TODO : FIXME
// For FT the resize should be done in its good position and not here ...
  if (result.nb_dim() == 1 ) result.resize(nb_polys,1);

  assert(values.line_size() == nb_components);
  assert(result.line_size() == nb_components || nb_components == 1);

  for (int i=0; i<nb_polys; i++)
    {
      int cell = polys(i);
      assert(cell<values.dimension_tot(0));

      for (int j = 0; j < result.line_size(); j++)
        if (cell != -1)
          result(i, j) = values.nb_dim() == 1 ? values(cell) : values(cell, (result.line_size() == nb_components) * j); //!< Some post-processed fields can have nb_dim() == 1
    }

  return result;
}

const IntVect &  polys,

) const [virtual]

Reimplemented in Champ_Fonc_P0_base, and Champ_Inc_P0_base.

Definition at line 100 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleVect::size(), IntVect::size(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();

  int nb_polys = polys.size();

  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(result.size() == nb_polys);

  assert(values.line_size() == ch_base.nb_comp());
  for (int i=0; i<nb_polys; i++)
    {
      int cell = polys(i);
      assert(cell<values.dimension_tot(0));
      if (cell!=-1)
        result(i) = values(cell,ncomp);
// result(i) = (cell == -1) ? 0 : values(cell,ncomp);
    }

  return result;
}
DoubleVect & Champ_implementation_P0::valeur_aux_sommets_compo_impl ( DoubleVect &  result,
int  ncomp 
) const [protected, virtual]

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Definition at line 184 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References Champ_implementation_base::get_zone_geom(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), Field_base::nb_comp(), Zone::nb_elem_tot(), Zone::nb_som(), Zone::nb_som_elem(), DoubleVect::size(), Zone::sommet_elem(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();

  const Zone& zone              = get_zone_geom();
  int      nb_cells          = zone.nb_elem_tot();
  int      nb_nodes          = zone.nb_som();
  int      nb_nodes_per_cell = zone.nb_som_elem();

  ArrOfInt count(nb_nodes);
// dvq ajout result=0;
  result=0;
  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(result.size() == nb_nodes);
  assert(values.line_size() == ch_base.nb_comp());

  for (int i=0; i<nb_cells; i++)
    for (int j=0; j<nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
      {
        int node = zone.sommet_elem(i,j);
        if (node < nb_nodes)
          {
            count[node]++;
            result(node) += values(i,ncomp);
          }
      }
  for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes; i++)
    result(i) /= count[i];

  return result;
}
DoubleTab & Champ_implementation_P0::valeur_aux_sommets_impl ( DoubleTab &  result) const [protected, virtual]

< TODO : FIXME : champ porosite doit etre un DoubleTab

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Definition at line 145 of file Champ_implementation_P0.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), Champ_implementation_base::get_zone_geom(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), Zone::nb_elem_tot(), Zone::nb_som(), Zone::nb_som_elem(), Zone::sommet_elem(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  int            nb_components = ch_base.nb_comp();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();

  const Zone& zone              = get_zone_geom();
  int      nb_cells          = zone.nb_elem_tot();
  int      nb_nodes          = zone.nb_som();
  int      nb_nodes_per_cell = zone.nb_som_elem();

  ArrOfInt count(nb_nodes);

  assert((result.dimension_tot(0) == nb_nodes)||(result.dimension(0) == nb_nodes));

  result = 0;
  count  = 0;

  assert(result.line_size() == nb_components);
  assert(values.line_size() == nb_components);

  for (int i=0; i<nb_cells; i++)
    for (int j=0; j<nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
      {
        int node = zone.sommet_elem(i,j);
        if (node < nb_nodes)
          {
            count[node]++;
            if ( values.nb_dim() == 1 ) //!< TODO : FIXME : champ porosite doit etre un DoubleTab
              for (int k=0; k<nb_components; k++) result(node,k) += values(i);
            else
              for (int k=0; k<nb_components; k++) result(node,k) += values(i,k);
          }
      }
  for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes; i++) for (int j=0; j<nb_components; j++) result(i,j) /= count[i];

  return result;
}
